backend/main.mo: Actor storing per-user food logs with functions to add entries, retrieve sorted entries, and compute nutrient totals.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend source files involved in meal and nutrition tracking.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts, icons, and mounts the React application.
frontend/README.md: Project overview and setup guide for the Daily Meal Nutrition Calculator frontend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component wrapping the app in ThemeProvider and rendering the main calculator page and toaster.
frontend/src/components/all-meals/AllMea: Displays saved meals with expandable sections and scaled nutrient values per food item.
frontend/src/components/current-meal/Cur: Main meal builder UI that parses food input, fetches nutrition data, manages food list edits, and displays meal totals with save controls.
frontend/src/components/current-meal/Foo: Editable row for a food item allowing amount/unit changes and showing scaled nutrition with optional conversion notes.
frontend/src/components/current-meal/Sav: Provides a dialog and controls to save the current meal under a category or custom name, then clears the builder.
frontend/src/components/daily-summary/Da: Displays daily nutrition totals, progress toward goals, hints, and options to edit goals or clear the day's data.
frontend/src/components/daily-summary/Ed: Dialog for modifying daily calorie and protein goals with validation before saving.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with logo, title, settings button, and API key warning banner.
frontend/src/components/nutrition/Nutrit: Renders a table or compact grid showing rounded macronutrient values for calories, protein, carbs, fat, fiber, and sugar.
frontend/src/components/nutrition/Vitami: Accordion panel listing vitamin and mineral values in an expandable layout.
frontend/src/components/settings/ApiKeyS: React dialog for entering, loading, and saving the USDA API key in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/Toaster.tsx: Theme-aware wrapper around the Sonner toast notification system.
frontend/src/domain/models.ts: Defines core TypeScript models for nutrients, food items, meals, parsed inputs, and daily state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, and logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module reserved for future backend React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables and base styling for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry rendering React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DailyMealNutritionCal: Main page composing current meal builder, meals list, and daily summary sections.
frontend/src/services/nutritionApiClient: USDA API client for searching foods and mapping results to FoodItem objects with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/state/storage.ts: LocalStorage persistence utilities for API keys, day state, and daily goals with safe access and versioning.
frontend/src/state/useCurrentMeal.ts: Hook managing the current meal’s food list with add, update, remove, and computed total nutrients.
frontend/src/state/useDailyGoals.ts: React hook that loads, updates, and persists custom daily nutrition goals and merges them with defaults.
frontend/src/state/useDayMeals.ts: Manages today's meals with localStorage persistence and computes daily nutrient totals.
frontend/src/utils/aggregations.ts: Provides pure functions to aggregate nutrient totals for meals and full days, including vitamin merging.
frontend/src/utils/foodParser.ts: Parses free‑text food input to extract item names, quantities, and units using simple pattern rules.
frontend/src/utils/nutrientMapping.ts: Maps USDA nutrient data fields into the app’s normalized Nutrients model, including vitamins and minerals.
frontend/src/utils/recommendations.ts: Calculates progress toward goals and generates simple health hints based on daily nutrient totals.
frontend/src/utils/servingMath.ts: Computes serving multipliers and scales nutrients based on user quantities and baseline serving metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Project Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, requirements, and known issues for the nutrition calculator app.
